metadata.title: CVE-2023-4001 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium

criterions.comment: grub2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
grub2-unsigned: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
grub2-signed: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
